activities:
If an employee visits our web site to learn more about InterplX Inc. and its services and they volunteer information, this information will be used only for the purposes of providing the employee with the requested information.

If an employee visits our web site to utilize our Expense Management Services contracted by their employer, any personal information collected is only used to provide the services under contract.
  
In all cases we will not sell, re-distribute or disclose any personal information to any other entity unless required by law or required by third party vendors, consultants and other service providers who are working on our behalf and need access to the employee’s information to carry out the contracted services.
personaldata: Employee Name, Business email address, Credit Card Number and Bank Account Number
recoursemech: Disputes concerning Inerplx Inc.'s adherence with the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles and this policy that are not resolved directly with Interplx, Inc. will be resolved utilizing the services of JAMS, which is a mediation service.
